sit back.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to get into a comfortable position, for example in a chair, and relax
sit back.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Sit back and relax – I’ll open a bottle of wine.
sit back.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to relax and make no effort to get involved in something or influence what happens
sit back.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Don’t just sit back and wait for new business to come to you.
